summary: Moves the \'Quiet Casting\' perk from the Illusion tree to the Sneak tree.
descriptionHtml: Very simple mod to fix an RP issue with the vanilla perk tree, namely the Quiet Casting perk being in the Illusion tree when it concerns stealth. The Illusion perk Master of the Mind now has Kindred Mage as its prerequisite rather than Quiet Casting (this is cosmetic only since you needed Kindred Mage anyway). Quiet Casting sits between \'Silence\' and \'Shadow Warrior\' on the Sneak perk tree, and requires 85 in Sneak.
author: Carzor Stelatis
